includedAssets.title: Dude Ranch
includedAssets.synopsis: The clan lasso laughs when they head to a dude ranch.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The clan lasso laughs when they head to a dude ranch.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The clan lasso laughs when they head to a dude ranch.

includedAssets.title: When Good Kids Go Bad
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - When Good Kids Go Bad
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitch and Cam decide to adopt another baby, now they just need to get little Lily on board... Plus, Gloria locks horns with Manny's principal.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mitch and Cam decide to adopt another baby, now they just need to get little Lily on board... Plus, Gloria locks horns with Manny's principal.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mitch and Cam decide to adopt another baby, now they just need to get little Lily on board... Plus, Gloria locks horns with Manny's principal.

includedAssets.title: Phil On Wire
includedAssets.synopsis: Cam embarks on a juice fast, and Mitch is helpless as he watches him go through the different stages of dieting. Plus, Phil decides to take up the tightrope.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cam embarks on a juice fast, and Mitch is helpless as he watches him go through the different stages of dieting. Phil takes up the tightrope.

includedAssets.title: Door To Door
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay helps Manny with a school fundraiser involving lots of wrapping paper, and Claire stresses over a stop sign. David Cross (Arrested Development) guests.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jay helps Manny with a school fundraiser involving lots of wrapping paper, and Claire stresses over a stop sign. David Cross guests.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jay helps Manny with a school fundraiser involving lots of wrapping paper, and Claire stresses over a stop sign. David Cross (Arrested Development) guests.

includedAssets.title: Hit And Run
includedAssets.synopsis: There must be something in the air because all the men in the family are angry. While Jay is frustrated at work, Mitch and Cam are involved in a fender bender.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jay is frustrated at work, Mitch and Cam are involved in a fender bender.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There must be something in the air because all the men in the family are angry. While Jay is frustrated at work, Mitch and Cam are involved in a fender bender.

includedAssets.title: Go Bullfrogs!
includedAssets.synopsis: While Phil spends some quality time with Haley, taking her on a college tour of his old alma mater, Gloria and Jay are forced to have 'the talk' with Manny.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Phil spends some quality time with Haley, taking her on a college tour of his old alma mater, Gloria and Jay are forced to have 'the talk' with
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Phil spends some quality time with Haley, taking her on a college tour of his old alma mater, Gloria and Jay are forced to have 'the talk' with Manny.

includedAssets.title: Treehouse
includedAssets.synopsis: Gloria gives Jay an ultimatum, Cam takes a bet too far and Phil builds a treehouse. Guest starring Jennifer Tilly, Chazz Palminteri, Kevin Hart and Leslie Mann.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gloria gives Jay an ultimatum, Cam takes a bet too far and Phil builds a treehouse. Guest starring Jennifer Tilly, Chazz Palminteri and Kevin Hart.

includedAssets.title: After The Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: When a neighbour's house burns down, the gang immediately roll up their sleeves to help out. Even their best-intentioned plans don't run smoothly though.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a neighbour's house burns down, the gang immediately roll up their sleeves to help out.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a neighbour's house burns down, the gang immediately roll up their sleeves to help out. Even their best-intentioned plans don't run smoothly though.

includedAssets.title: Punkin Chunkin
includedAssets.synopsis: It may be Thanksgiving, but the clan aren't feeling particularly thankful. Phil can't help thinking about what could have been, before Mitch offends Cam.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It may be Thanksgiving, but the clan aren't feeling particularly thankful. Phil can't help thinking about what could have been and Mitch offends Cam.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It may be Thanksgiving, but the clan aren't feeling particularly thankful. Phil can't help thinking about what could have been, before Mitch offends Cam.

includedAssets.title: Express Christmas
includedAssets.synopsis: The clan are sad to discover that they won't be able to celebrate Christmas together this year. Unless, that is, they bring the holiday forward...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The clan are sad to discover that they won't be able to celebrate Christmas together this year. Unless, that is, they bring the holiday forward...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The clan are sad to discover that they won't be able to celebrate Christmas together this year. Unless, that is, they bring the holiday forward...

includedAssets.title: Lifetime Supply
includedAssets.synopsis: Poor Phil fears the worst after a routine check-up, and Jay and Manny's (step) father-son day is interrupted. Benjamin Bratt and Philip Baker Hall guest.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil fears the worst after a routine check-up, and Jay and Manny's (step) father-son day is interrupted. Benjamin Bratt and Philip Baker Hall guest.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Poor Phil fears the worst after a routine check-up, and Jay and Manny's (step) father-son day is interrupted. Benjamin Bratt and Philip Baker Hall guest.

includedAssets.title: Egg Drop
includedAssets.synopsis: It's dad versus daughter when Jay and Claire help out with a school project. The pressure is on Mitch and Cam, too, when they meet with prospective birth mothers.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's dad versus daughter when Jay and Claire help out with a school project.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's dad versus daughter when Jay and Claire help out with a school project. The pressure is on Mitch and Cam, too, when they meet with prospective birth mothers.

includedAssets.title: Little Bo Bleep
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitch and Cam flap when Lily discovers her very first expletive, and Claire locks horns with Duane Bailey (a returning David Cross) in a televised debate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mitch and Cam flap when Lily discovers her very first expletive, and Claire locks horns with Duane Bailey (David Cross) in a televised debate.

includedAssets.title: Me? Jealous?
includedAssets.synopsis: While Phil is preoccupied with impressing a prospective client, Jay and Gloria open their home to Mitch and Cam. Academy Award nominee Greg Kinnear guests.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Phil is preoccupied with impressing a prospective client, Jay and Gloria open their home to Mitch and Cam. Greg Kinnear guests.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Phil is preoccupied with impressing a prospective client, Jay and Gloria open their home to Mitch and Cam. Academy Award nominee Greg Kinnear guests.

includedAssets.title: Aunt Mommy
includedAssets.synopsis: Drinking and decision-making don't go hand-in-hand when Claire and Phil treat Mitch and Cam to dinner. Jay learns more about a certain mother-son bond as well.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Drinking and decision-making don't go hand-in-hand when Claire and Phil treat Mitch and Cam to dinner.

includedAssets.title: Virgin Territory
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil realises that his little girl is growing up when he overhears something he wishes he hadn't about Haley. Meanwhile, Jay's ego takes a bruising.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil realises that his little girl is growing up when he overhears something he wishes he hadn't about Haley. Meanwhile, Jay's ego takes a bruising.

includedAssets.title: Leap Day
includedAssets.synopsis: With Cam's birthday falling but once every four years, the pressure is on Mitch to do something special. Emotions are running high over at the Dunphys' too.

includedAssets.title: Send Out The Clowns
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep18 - Send Out The Clowns
includedAssets.synopsis: Cam comes nose-to-nose with his ex-clown partner, and Phil faces his real-estate nemesis. Guest starring Ellen Barkin and Bobby Cannavale.

includedAssets.title: Election Day
includedAssets.synopsis: The race for town councilman comes to a head, but there's still time for some last-minute campaigning. Emmy winner Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad) directs.

includedAssets.title: The Last Walt
includedAssets.synopsis: On a visit from the farm, Cam's dad, Merle (Barry Corbin, Dallas), clashes with Jay. Plus, Luke is down in the dumps when he receives some bad news.

includedAssets.title: Planes, Trains & Cars
includedAssets.synopsis: While Phil and Andre enjoy a car shopping trip, Mitch and Cam have a problem on their hands when Lily loses her toy. Comedian Kevin Hart returns.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Phil and Andre enjoy a car shopping trip, Mitch and Cam have a problem on their hands when Lily loses her toy. Comedian Kevin Hart returns.

includedAssets.title: Disneyland
includedAssets.synopsis: The Dunphy-Pritchett-Tuckers are let loose in Disneyland. Phil tries to keep up with Luke, and Mitch and Cam deal with Lily's newfound affinity for running.
